title: Opinion: States no longer have to report Medicaid, CHIP vaccination rates to CMS, further undermining immunization
description: Medicaid and CHIP cover almost half of American children. A new CMS policy means we will know less about their health.
content: Medicaid and CHIP cover almost half of American children. A new CMS policy means we will know less about their health.
